creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: three volumes bound as one; second volume: common women in garden scenes, along river banks, etc.; outside cover is dark blue and gold brocade; volume cover is dark blue
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
title: Ilustrated  Lives of Famous and Not-So-Famous Women (Ehon tokiwagusa), vol. 2
